Summary: saw red lights moving in sky, then a saucer shoot off
divs: Sighting Detailsi could go on and on about just sitting on my porch and watching the sky, i can say this it all started about a month ago, and now it has progressed into items where i am thinking i am going crazy, my neighbor has seen it, former roommate, my wife, my kids during the day using led light blinking during cloud coverage seening lights blink back, my coworker during day watching a light that was red at times but shiny create a cloud that didn't move, while all others moving, seeing dark masses in white clouds popping in and out during night. im a realist, but due to the current things i have seen i have fear that is overwhelming, i know what jets can do as well as choppers, but the laws of phyiscs are being broken by motions, sudden speeds that jets would make a sonic sound and these have no sounds i have seen planes come out of nowhere about 5 minutes after seeing these events, so many to list whats going on i cant sleep at night, i now wake up at 3 to 4 am nightly to every other night. all i know is that being scared and a feeling of being sick after seeing these things as well as others, still i want to go outside and try to see something else even though the fear gets a little overwhelming
Object Shape: Diamond, Disc, Fireball, Flash, Star-like, Triangle, Other
